name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Preheat a skillet over medium heat.
Butter one side of each slice of bread.
Place one slice of bread, buttered side down, in the skillet.
Add the cheese slices on top of the bread.
Place the second slice of bread, buttered side up, on top of the cheese.
Cook until the bottom slice of bread is golden brown, then flip the sandwich.
Cook until the second slice of bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted.
Remove from skillet, let cool for a minute, and then cut into halves. Serve immediately.
